definition: (bird species of China) lesser yellowlegs (Tringa flavipes)
yellow bicycle (by Ofo bicycle sharing company)

sentences.english: Xiao Huang was stricken by AIDS when he had blood transfusion in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 小黃在醫院輸血後，不幸感染了艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: It seems Miss Daisy has many problems.
sentences.chinese: 小黃好像有不少問題啊。

sentences.english: Huang likes to travel as a backpacker.
sentences.chinese: 小黃喜歡揹包徒步旅行。

sentences.english: Xiaohuang had been waiting for Liqing for an hour by the time she arrived.
sentences.chinese: 當麗卿到達時，小黃已等待她一個小時了。

sentences.english: Slowly, but surely a layer of dust keeps building up on Miss Daisy and my clothes.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地，小黃和我的衣服上就積起了一層灰土。

definition: that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
to change color/to discolor/to change countenance/to become angry
